title: How do I enable multi-screen interaction when Wi-Fi is turned off on my phone?
answer:
A note will be displayed to ask you to turn on Wi-Fi. Touch OK and the Settings screen will be displayed where you can turn on Wi-Fi and connect your phone to a Wi-Fi network. 

Figure 1-1Note displayed to ask you to turn on Wi-Fi 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109620)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109621)

 After your phone connects to a Wi-Fi network, flick down from the top of the screen to open the shortcuts menu, and then touch Multi-screen.
